CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: high-explosive
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The high-explosive charge detonates on impact, scattering lethal shell fragments in a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: High-explosive dual-purpose
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Grenade with a shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: High-explosive airburst
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Grenade with a timed fuze designed to detonate mid-flight for maxiumum effectiveness.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EMP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary agent. The agent is dispersed on impact, covering the area in flames.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Smoke
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a smoke-producing agent. Explodes on impact to generate a thick smokescreen.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: tear gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a non-lethal chemical agent capable of causing pain, irritation, and temporary blindness.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Toxic
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with tox gas, a caustic agent that burns the lungs and eyes. Continued exposure to it results in toxic buildup which can be lethal.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Deadlife
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a dust-like substance that explodes into a cloud and reanimates nearby corpses.
